block_comment: This block of Verilog RTL code manages the depth and length parameters of a vibrato effect based on a predetermined index. Depending on the index (`r_vibrato_index`), specific vibrato depth (`r_vibrato_depth`) and length (`r_vibrato_len`) values are set. The length is further calculated using a function `note_len()` which accepts specific numerical argument based on the index. A default case is also implemented to ensure any unhandled index leads to a predetermined vibrato depth and length.
